find_your_next_favorite_movie_here: Find Your Next Favorite Movie Here
get_access: Get access to a huge library of movies to suit all tastes. You will surely like it.
share_your_thoughts: Share your thoughts on the movies you've watched. Dive deep into film details and help others discover great movies with your reviews.
discover_movies_from_every_genre: Discover movies from every genre, in all available qualities. Find something new and exciting to watch every day.
explore_a_vest: Explore a vast collection of movies in all qualities and genres. Find your next favorite film with ease.
save_movies_to_your_watchlist: Save movies to your watchlist to keep track of what you want to watch next. Enjoy films in various qualities and genres.
name: Name
name_min_length: Name must be at least 3 characters
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters
